Member Enumeration Documentation

enum AudioVibratorDevice::VibratorMode
 

Operating mode of vibrator. Tells which mode the vibrator should be working in. At present only VibratorModeAsync2 mode is implemented by DWD.

Enumerator:
VibratorModeAsync1  Not implemented yet.
VibratorModeAsync2  The vibrator is controlled asynchronously with the ringer.
The vibrator is on and off for fixed periods of time.
VibratorModeSync1  Not implemented yet.
VibratorModeSync2  Not implemented yet.

Member Function Documentation

Get the unique device ID used whenever the resource is allocated (not used in casse of speech device since the allocation is done by MN process).

Implements DwdDevice.

BOOLEAN AudioVibratorDevice::StartVibrator (  VibratorMode  mode = VibratorModeAsync2,
INT16  on = -1,
INT16  off = 0
) 
 

Start the Vibrator, also known as the Trembler. If the device is getting an invalid time for on or off the function chooses the nearest legal value.

Parameters:
mode Mode the vibrator is working
on On time of the vibrator in ms. Currently supported: 400, 600, 800, 1000ms
off Off time of the vibrator in ms. Currently supported: 200, 300, 400, 600ms
Returns:
TRUE if successful

void AudioVibratorDevice::StopVibrator (   ) 
 

Stop the Vibrator, also known as the Trembler.

Returns:
TRUE is successful
